## Mehulkumar Shiroya  
**Ph.D. Researcher | Silicon Tracking Detectors | Heavy-Ion Physics**

I am a Ph.D. researcher working on the **Silicon Tracking System (STS)** of the **Compressed Baryonic Matter (CBM)** experiment at FAIR, GSI Darmstadt.  
My research bridges **detector development**, **simulation**, and **data analysis**, with a focus on precision silicon microstrip detectors for high-rate heavy-ion collisions.
